comment: Move proper substitution in and out of a membership relation. Note that the scope of ` [. A / x ]. ` is the wff ` B e. C ` , whereas the scope of ` [_ A / x ]_ ` is the class ` B ` . (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)
